metadata.title: Are ‘Made for Kids’ apps supported with a Parental Gate?

abstract.text: Learn how to use our built-in parental gate for apps ‘Made for Kids’ to comply with Apples guidelines and avoid accidental purchases by small children.

inlineContent.text: Yes, the FreemiumKit SDK ships with a built-in parental gate. Just call

for apps in the Kids category.
